state.name: Fabrik Details
state.description: Link to a Fabrik details view

param.name: fabrik
param.label: Form
param.description: The form to show - if the view is set to view form

param.name: rowid
param.label: Row id
param.description: The table row to show in the form - if the view is set to view form. Set to -1 to replace with the user's id

param.name: usekey
param.label: Key name
param.description: Column name to use with Row id, leave blank to use primary key (only set this if you know what you are doing!). If row id set to -1 then set this column to the name of the form's user id element to prepopulate forms with the users record

param.name: random
param.label: Show random records
param.description: Setting this to yes will randomly display a record. Note prefilters are still applied
